snippet: The Ghost is stately, delivers its comfort in style and tames road imperfections like no other automobile.
abstract: Driven column review of 2015 Rolls-Royce Ghost.
lead_paragraph: The Ghost is stately, delivers its comfort in style and tames road imperfections like no other automobile.

headline.print_headline: The Rolls-Royce Ghost: A Pampered Ride for the Chauffeur, Too
headline.main: Video Review: With the Rolls-Royce Ghost, a Pampered Ride for the Chauffeur, Too
